name: Operation B.A.M
description:
After being obliterated by the red rats, your team finds itself in a tough space. It seems everyone has been injured or killed, except for.....

The Medic

As the Medic, it is your job to:

1) Shoot your way through enemies, tanks, and whatever stands in your way

2) Dodge obstacles like landmines and barbed wire

and most importantly...

3) Revive wounded teammates for more help. After all, you are Stronger Together

It's time to initiate:

Operation Bad Ass Medic

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 

Theme: Stronger Together
